website_summaries.verdict: One of the more affordably priced pergolas. It includes a weather-resistant shade covering for comfort.
pros: This pergola is roughly 9 by 9 feet and it features a retractable canopy for protection from the sun
It is manufactured using powder-coated aluminum poles for durability and the unit has a contemporary look
cons: The included directions are not very clear, so a bit of logic will be needed to complete the assembly

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly using logic, directions enclosed help some, but mostly STINK!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Arrived safely, no shipping damage. Packaged well. Quality components, looks good, and most important for my needs it was the right size for my small concrete patio. Only minor cutting made it fit, and the aluminum cut easily. Since the entire structure is very lightweight, I will purchase concrete screws and anchor the 4 corners down, soon. I am looking forward to being able to ENJOY the shade on my patio. Took 2 people 2.3 hours from start to finish to install. Not bad at all. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Diana M Mercier

customer_reviews.title: When you are done assembling you will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So I bought it already aware from reading the reviews that it was going to be difficult to put together. The directions are not good. But we did figure it out just like everyone else said. My 17 year old son and his girlfriend put it together in about 3 hours total. Definitely glad we got it it’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Shady and awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say this was 'easy' to assemble, but it's very sturdy and looks wonderful. It also wasn't the cheapest one we found, but we've decided it was definitely worth the price. Great finish, and the canopy is a really high-quality mesh material that'll last for a decade or more. Very happy with this pergola!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Mickus

customer_reviews.title: Easy for two people to assemble and weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: This Pergola is perfect for covering our hot tub. I can keep the shade retracted for night time sky view and extended to keep the sun off the hot tub cover. It was easy enough for my wife and I to assemble. We didn't throw any tools at each other :). I like the fact that it is weather resistant and It looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bengtsson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible scratches and fragile paint. Returned
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and started setting the pieces out for assembly and started putting it together, I noticed massive scratches on the paint of many of the pieces. Three of the legs had scratches on their faces. I tried to cover them up but they were still too visible. The paint on these aluminum pieces practically scrapes off with a fingernail. I tried to look past it but I can only imagine more damage will appear from everyday use and im NOT going to settle for having paint and fix something i bought brand new for over $300. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pergola
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this pergola is great! Pro- the aluminum won't rust ... Con- it is a little lightweight. We bolted the pergola to paver stones and it seems like it will hold up well! Only took a few hours to assemble with two people. The shade is really neat as it slides open or closed. My wife was worried about how it would look, but she loves it. Doesn't look cheap and is functional. Note the price here on Amazon fluctuates... We waited til it was a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob w.

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect you from the Sun hardly any
customer_reviews.text: This is so pretty on my deck just need more sun cover can not set out in the day time at all so what does it do except look pretty? Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: debbie harmon

customer_reviews.title: Nice styling
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and relatively sturdy. Instructions not the greatest. Hired a handyman to assemble. Took handyman and assistant about 3 hours to assemble. Good for the price point. Will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: No damage whatsoever from shipping. Pretty straightforward to put together. Will need two people for installation. Very sturdy and great look to it.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pergola
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the pergola. One of the pillars was dented in the box, however, overall we are happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Leo Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Great but difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were all but non-existent. No description or details, just images only in the instructions. It took me 5 hours to assemble by myself and move it into position by myself. Probably could have done it in 3 1/2 or 4 hours by myself but made mistakes in assembly twice requiring taking part if apart and re-doing it. This all because there is only images and not really clear , with no descriptions. Otherwise, once assembled, it is very sturdy, looks great and is a terrific addition to my back patio.
customer_reviews.author: Josh1

customer_reviews.title: Nice pergola... but the directions are confusing
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the pergola.. it is a great addition to any backyard. The directions howrver are a bit challenging. You have to figure out quite a bit on your own. I would say be prepared to take a few parts a loose a few times before you get it right. The process took about 3 to 4 hours. Which is too much time in my opinion for something as simple as this. BUT I would still purchase again. I'm another sure how it will hold up over time it been about 2 weeks and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Great Pergola!  Beefy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing pergola. I bought it to replace a similar one. I originally purchased a different one from a different company which was returned instantly for having two-part uprights. WEAK! This Coolaroo Aurora Pergola, Backyard or Patio Shade Pergola has very beefy uprights make for a sturdy pergola! Great buy and would recommend this to anyone. Spend the extra $70-$100 to get a solid piece that will last! The directions for attaching the cloth top were a little hard to figure out, but that was the only negative. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: A nice low-priced pergola option.
customer_reviews.text: This took my daughter and I about three day (3-4 hours each day) to put this together. You will need at least two people for assembly. The directions aren't the best and certainly not as easy as an IKEA instruction manual. They aren't horrible either. We screwed up a couple times and had to start over so it took us longer than it should have. We had a biggish wind storm about a week after we got it together and it didn't fall over. We live in a very hot area and it does a good job of notching down the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Elk

customer_reviews.title: Overall very nice pergola
customer_reviews.text: I love this pergola because it provides nice shade and looks nice . My only problem is I don’t think it was worth how much I paid for it . Still very nice though !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, at first...
customer_reviews.text: For the first year this product worked well - I listened to other reviewers and weighted down the feet, since we did not want to screw it into the cement patio. However, after 1 year the clips that hold the top screen on have almost all broken, the plastic just cracked. In addition, the rope on the shade has almost completely disintegrated in spots. For the price, I would have expected it to last longer than one year. We are disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pergola! The canopy gives shade without being heavy, sort of an open weave so you can still kind of see through it. We put some sand in each of the posts so we did not anchor it, but it has held up in some pretty hefty winds, rain and a couple of inches of snow. Slows down the rain but not completely. Took 2 of us an afternoon to assemble, but we did take our time and did have to backtrack twice but no big deal. Instructions are only diagrams so interpretation was tricky a few times.
customer_reviews.author: deborah dimaggio

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this but just after one season in the sun the plastic runners started breaking and then the rope broke. I fastened the shade up a different way when putting up and taking down but not as convenient as using the runners. I’ve had the stand for two years now and it’s doing well but I did have to paint it since it faded to a light gray.
customer_reviews.author: Net

customer_reviews.title: not like the advertised picture
customer_reviews.text: After the setup, it did not look like the advertised picture and you CAN NOT lock the shade once you pull it all the way back from wind, etc. When I called customer support they told me to get a small cord to tie it down! Not good reply
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I am 80 years old, Janet is 73, We assembled this in about 2 hours. There was one problem that required a tap & die set to tap one insert on one shade crossbar. There are some lose paint spots this could have happened in shipping, they have not rusted, appears to be solid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best thing about this is the ease in which it went up. Couple of things though...scratches really easily. Also did not come with all the parts. It came with 13 wheel rollers for the shade. It needs 15, so the shade sags right now. Hopefully they will send more.
customer_reviews.author: SDbuystuff

customer_reviews.title: Instructions unclear, uninformed customer service
customer_reviews.text: Pergola is good. Bought a side shade from coolaroo too. Have called service multiple time for instructions as to how this attaches to my coolaroo pergola. No one has any idea. It’s frustrating when two products from the same manufacturer don’t assemble like they show in their pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Ogborn

customer_reviews.title: Wedding present
customer_reviews.text: This is just lovely, and I have seen pictures of it in my son's back yard. They didn't have to much trouble putting it together, thanks for a wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Tenia Dossett

customer_reviews.title: This Pergola is worth buying, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love love live this Pergola! Very sturdy and cosmetically very appealing to the eye! Will definitely recommend this to friends and family, worth buying for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Morena

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pergola back in March put it up yesterday (End of May) - it had missing parts (in the package 5 rollers marked “L” was missing) they go on the center beam for opening and closing the canopy so I could still use it but it is not correct.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Garverick

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged and scratched. Box was all tore up. Had to return as it was poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carolan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely gorgeous Pergola. It took a while to put together and it wasn’t as seamless as I had hoped it would be but in the end it was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but wish it was a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but wish it was a little bigger. My patio is a standard patio and if it were 10 x 10 would have fit the patio a little better. Still, I really like it. It took one many approximately 2 hours to put it together and a couple of us helped him stand it up and position it. Have not screwed it to patio yet but I live in No CA and we have not had strong winds but plan to anchor it down before winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have been better I'd say the packaging needs to be better to ...
customer_reviews.text: There are only a couple reasons it didn't get 5 stars. A couple end pieces are bent . Still functional but could not but one screw in because of it. The directions are your typical -figure out the picture. If it had a couple warnings on what not to do. Would have been better I'd say the packaging needs to be better to help with the denting. Other than that I would have given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: T. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Light enough to assemble but very sturdy. Love the clean lines.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Dented box
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking but items came in dented and really scratched also the tarp came slightly torn.
customer_reviews.author: ralph diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not again!
customer_reviews.text: I would not have chosen this gazebo/pergola if I had known how difficult the assembly instructions would be. No written instructions, only a picture diagram of steps to assemble frame. Not adequate diagram of canopy assembly. We had to unassemble both frame and canopy and redo. Not sturdy design. I would not recommend this brand purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valare Clark

customer_reviews.title: Numerous damaged pieces
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged - huge gash in a main pillar, numerous other pieces damaged. So disappointed as I bought this to have for our deck this summer and it already had a longer shipping time than most amazon products.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase. Unlike several reviews
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Unlike several reviews, our pergola arrived on time and without any damage. It was extremely easy to assemble.... however be careful and make sure you follow instructions for the four legs...they are different and you need to follow the lettering. We chose to put the legs in large planters with sand and dirt. This made the unit very sturdy and also allowed us to plant vines on the top of the planter that will grow around the pillars.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Echeverria

customer_reviews.title: I did have them bolt it down since it's light weight enough I could see it tipping in a good gust. The canopy can rattle with wi
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I did my backyard. My contractor's guys assembled this so I can't speak to ease of Assembly. I did have them bolt it down since it's light weight enough I could see it tipping in a good gust. The canopy can rattle with wind.
customer_reviews.author: Erica R

customer_reviews.title: I would not advise buying this pergola
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pergola last spring. I live in the desert southwest. The summers are very hot. The cover has ties that are used to retract the top. They completely rotted within 2 months.The material of the cover is good. I slid 4x4's inside the posts because they are quite flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Love how it’s lightweight but still can handle the strong desert winds.
customer_reviews.author: A Weller

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: A great product. A couple of the pieces were damaged and scratched.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: was able to install in less than 30 minutes great instructions. well made product blocks the sun not ...
customer_reviews.text: was able to install in less than 30 minutes great instructions. well made product blocks the sun not very heavy so if in a windy area need to weigh sown legs i put bricks on the ends of mine to prevent any movement
customer_reviews.author: DeeRunRun

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise assembly was fairly easy one Major note
customer_reviews.text: couple of minor issues: one leg was severely damaged on arrival, however after contacting Coolaroo & Amazon it was replaced within 3 days by a new leg. assembly instructions could use a bit of clarification. but otherwise assembly was fairly easy one Major note: even with redwood 4x4 inside the legs for added strength this is a very light assembly take care with securing it to the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Downing

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! some of the poles metal was bent ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! some of the poles metal was bent on top making it a little hard to put the caps on but nothing so bad we couldn't overcome
customer_reviews.author: cruzy

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: This was a breeze to assemble. There were no parts missing and the instructions were pretty clear. You need two people to build this and I built it with my teenage sons. I anchored mine into paver bricks to ballast it. The wind picked up towards the end of assembly but it say right in place. I'd still recommend pulling back the canvas when windy just in case. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the color of red in the sale posting is a little misleading. It's more of a brown/orange. I'll update again once it's been up a while.
customer_reviews.author: E. Armijo

customer_reviews.title: Cool shade
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shade, looks great on my patio! Visitors impressed with workmanship and design. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is just what I wanted. Only problem was ...
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I wanted. Only problem was the package that arrived was damaged and I was missing an end cap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good for price. easy to assemble. one person with 6 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: aden s.

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful and my neighbors all want one
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful and my neighbors all want one! It took me approximately 4 hours to assemble by myself, but I am also a 5"4 woman, so I really don't think it was that bad. A rubber mallet is necessary. It is great quality and super cute, especially considering the price. I have always wanted one and I really shopped around for one that appeared to be inexpensive. I am so glad I decided to get this one. It really transforms my yard and I enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Merri

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Before purchasing this item, I did a lot of research on similar pergolas from the big home improvement stores. This one was quickly delivered, easy to assemble, and true to size. The frame is more dark charcoal or steel than black. Nevertheless, it is attractive with terra cotta canopy. New Jersey can have harsh winters so I secured the four posts to my concrete patio using wedge anchors. I was new to using a hammer drill on the concrete. Otherwise, the assembly required only basic tools.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: shade or sun your choice
customer_reviews.text: almost a one man job.......like the terracota top against the black/charcoal frame......worked out in the spot neededreal well...like the curtain effect... stuck a fountain under it all.....lookin' kool
customer_reviews.author: william mcmillan

product_meta.title: Coolaroo Aurora Pergola, Backyard or Patio Shade Pergola, Light Filtering 90% UV Block, (9'8" X 9'8"), Smoke
product_meta.description: Size:9'8" X 9'8"| Color:SmokeThe Aurora pergola’s design elevates your outdoor space with a modern look. Sturdy yet lightweight, this roman style shade canopy provides superior UV block.
feature_bullets: Weather resistant Coolaroo knitted fabric is breathable and light filtering
Modern color and design for contemporary look
Powder coated aluminum poles for long life

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
